Uses of Interface
mangan.DeploymentStrategy

  • Packages that use DeploymentStrategy 
    Package Description
    mangan  

    • Uses of DeploymentStrategy in mangan

      Classes in mangan that implement DeploymentStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DeployAngularSpiral
      Deploys an amount of robots following an angular spiral pattern, the robots are equally distributed over the length of the complete spiral
      class  DeployBadCenters
      Deploys an amount of robots throwing two gaussian distributions randomly spread on the map, but forcing the center of the gaussian functions to be quite distant, so we can test the behavior of the robots in two irregular groups.
      class  DeployCircle
      Deploys an amount of robots following a circle pattern where every robots keeps the distance with the inner and outer layer or perimeter as well as the other robots in its layer.
      class  DeployGauss
      Deploys an amount of robots in random positions following a Gaussian distribution , using a predefined Mean and Variance
      class  DeployRandom
      Deploys an amount of robots in random positions within the given sea limits.
      class  DeploySpiral
      Deploys an amount of robots following a archimedean spiral pattern with 4 circles.
      class  DeploySquare
      Deploys an amount of robots following a filled squared pattern.
      Constructors in mangan with parameters of type DeploymentStrategy 
      Constructor and Description
      DeploymentContext(DeploymentStrategy strategy)
      Constructor needs a DeploymentStrategy.
